bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Writing biao chuang 瘭瘡 , flaming-heat-illness sores . Alternative Names chi biao 赤熛 , red flaming heat. Pathological Condition identical with re chuang 熱瘡 , heat sores. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 50: 為風熱毒氣所傷， 客於皮膚，生熛漿，而潰成瘡，名為熛瘡也 , “If one is harmed by the poison qi of wind and heat, it will settle in the skin and generate thick flame liquid which then festers and generates sores. They are called flaming - heat sores ”.
